markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 5"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Vanara Weapon Trickery](/Feats.aspx?ID=4011) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 56</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Vanara Weapon Familiarity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4004)

</column>

---

You've learned how to trick your foes using vanara weapons. Whenever you critically hit using a [bo staff](/Weapons.aspx?ID=17), [chakram](/Weapons.aspx?ID=235), [katar](/Weapons.aspx?ID=14), [panabas](/Weapons.aspx?ID=265), [urumi](/Weapons.aspx?ID=102), or [vanara](/Traits.aspx?ID=368) weapon, you apply the weapon's [critical specialization effect](/Rules.aspx?ID=235).
name: Vanara Weapon Trickery
